content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Good evening Mr. Li, it's pleasure to meet you. I am very interested in hearing your proposal for the rental price of this apartment. Please let me know your offer.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Your offer is 550 euros per month. You are willing to negotiate, but only if the landlord is willing to accept a lower price.

If the landlord is willing to accept your offer of 550 euros per month, I agree to the price of 550 euros per month. If not, I am willing to negotiate further.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Li. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am afraid I cannot accept this price. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains and I believe this offer does not reflect the true value of the apartment. I am open to discussing a higher rental price that reflects the market rate and the quality of the apartment. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to increase my offer to 600 euros per month. However, I am not willing to go any higher than that. I am very responsible and dependable, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your willingness to increase your offer, Mr. Li. I appreciate your consideration and I am willing to negotiate with you.
